tool.name: Process hairpin and mature file of miRBase
tool.description: Process files hairpin.fa and mature.fa of miRBase to use for miRDeep2
tool.help:
**What it does** Prepare files mature and hairpin using the format of miRBase to be used in the next module miRDeep2.
**Input** Two file format FASTA (a file of miRNAs and an other of precursors) and a prefixe of three letters.
**Output** A file FASTA containing precursors of specie studied without spaces, a file FASTA containing miRNAs of specie studied without spaces and a file FASTA containing miRNAs others species without spaces.
